thread.title: Stephen Mcclung
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Stephen Mcclung

author: Stephen Mcclung
title: Stephen Mcclung
text: I bought two really expensive sets of glasses but I was not able to get them to fit properly using local eye wear services. Local businesses did not have anyone with the expertise to be touching such expensive glasses and they screwed them up. Next time, I'll probably buy from an optometrist that offers a full line of eyewear and professional fitment.
